entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse So, a @nytimes article says @WhiteHouse #COVID19  “task force “ is winding down. (It’s the one where @VP  is “in charge,” but where Trump pretends it’s a rally.) Maybe now someone can get something done. Trump can stay on Twitter all day occupied with complaining about ratings.
